definition: to part forever/eternal parting (i.e. death)
forever/always/perpetual
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to die

sentences.english: Fare well, Ai Iijima, I'll remember your love forever.
sentences.chinese: 永別了，飯島愛，我永遠會記得妳的愛。

sentences.english: This could mean the end for me. And it definitely means the end for me and my friend.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說真像世界末日，這意味着我和她將要永別了。

sentences.english: Comrade Zhou Enlai finally departed from us.
sentences.chinese: 周恩來同志和我們永別了。

sentences.english: And then I said farewell to sun light , and set out to become what I became.
sentences.chinese: 然後我就對陽永別了，變成了我現在的這個樣子。

sentences.english: Fare well, Ai Iijima, I'll remember your love.
sentences.chinese: 永別了，飯島愛，我永遠會記得妳的愛。

sentences.english: Farewell for good, Ai Iijima, and I'll remember your love forever.
sentences.chinese: 永別了，飯島愛，我永遠會記得妳的愛。

sentences.english: Each bore the moniker "Close Your Eyes and Say Goodbye."
sentences.chinese: 每張照片都取名爲“閉上你的雙眼，和世界說永別。”

sentences.english: Now, the corporation which I has worked for 488 days, farewell.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，我工作了488天的公司，永別了。

sentences.english: Takuya suddenly received a farewell message sent by Ami, very surprised.
sentences.chinese: 拓也突然收到了亞美髮來的永別短信，十分喫驚。

sentences.english: Two suspicious items are suspected respectively.
sentences.chinese: 兩個可疑的方面永別遭到疑忌。

definition: to bid farewell/to part (usually with little hope of meeting again)
separated in life and death/to part for ever
to go separate ways (idiom)/to part ways with sb/Taiwan pr. [ge4 ben1 dong1 xi1]
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
on parting/facing separation
to stake all on one throw
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
with complex feelings (idiom)
seriously ill and about to die
downhearted/downcast/in despair
hard to remember
dejected/disheartened/listless
promise
